feed.title: DBEV Phylogenomics Workshop 2022
feed.subtitle: Workshop based on delivering contemporary and practical education materials for phylogenetics

entry.title: Welcome to the DBEV Phylogenomics Workshop

link.title: Welcome to the DBEV Phylogenomics Workshop

entry.content:
We are excited to start a new phylogenomics workshop, hosted by the Department of Biology and Plant Ecology (DBEV) at the University of Antananarivo. Workshop activities will take place over three days (6 March - 9 March), with exact times and location to be determined.

Computers will be provided on-site for analyses and exercises; however, students may bring their own machines as they like. The workshop will be limited to 20 participants.
entry.summary: We are excited to start a new phylogenomics workshop, hosted by the Department of Biology and Plant Ecology (DBEV) at the University of Antananarivo. Workshop activities will take place over three days (6 March - 9 March), with exact times and location to be determined.
